Abstract:
Abstract: The Landsat Thematic Mapper (TM) is a sensor carried 
                onboard Landsats 4 and 5 and has acquired images of the Earth nearly 
                continuously from July 1982 to the present, with a 16-day repeat cycle.
                Landsat TM image data consist of seven spectral bands (band designations) with a 
                spatial resolution of 30 meters for bands 1 to 5 and band 7. Spatial resolution for 
                band 6 (thermal infrared) is 120 meters, but band 6 data are oversampled to 30 
                meter pixel size. Approximate scene size is 170 km north-south by 183 km 
                east-west (106 mi by 114 mi). 
                Systematic Correction (Level 1G) includes both radiometric and geometric correction. 
                The scene will be rotated, aligned, and georeferenced to a user-specified map 
                projection. Absolute geometric accuracy of the systematically corrected Landsat 
                TM product can vary, depending on the accuracy of the predicted ephemeris that 
                is used for processing. Please be aware that TM Level 1G products may require 
                additional image geometric correction and/or co-registration to known ground 
                control points (GCPs). 
                Precision Correction (Level 1P) includes radiometric and geometric correction, as 
                well as the use of ground control points (GCPs) to improve geometric accuracy. For 
                locations outside the United States, accuracy of the precision-corrected product will 
                depend on the availability of local GCPs. 
                Terrain Correction (Level 1T) includes radiometric and geometric precision 
                correction, as well as the use of a digital elevation model (DEM) to improve the 
                satellite model and to correct for relief displacement caused by local terrain. For 
                locations outside the United States, the accuracy of a terrain-corrected product will 
                depend on the availability of local ground control points (GCPs), as well as the 
                quality of the best available DEM.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: AcquisitionDate
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Year, month and day that this scene was imaged.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: AquisitionQuality
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Acquisition Quality is a value, expressed as a single digit number, based on: (1) errors encountered during archive processing; and/or (2) visible artifacts in the data when manually inspected.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: CCTSourceAvailable
AdditionalAttributes.Description: CCT source(s) (comma separated list) available in the archive for this scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: CloudCoverQuadLowerLeft
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Cloud coverage (percent) of the lower left quadrant of the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: CloudCoverQuadLowerRight
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Cloud coverage (percent) of the lower right quadrant of the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: CloudCoverQuadUpperLeft
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Cloud coverage (percent) of the upper left quadrant of the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: CloudCoverQuadUpperRight
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Cloud coverage (percent) of the upper right quadrant of the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: DCTSourceAvailable
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Digital archive source(s) (comma separated list) available for this scene id.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: DataTypeL0rp
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Data type identifier string used to create the L0Rp product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Datum
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Datum used in creating the image.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: DownloadAvailable
AdditionalAttributes.Description: DownloadAvailable

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ElevationSource
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Digital elevation dataset that was used to terrain-correct the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Ellipsoid
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Ellipsoid used in creating the image.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: EphemerisType
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Orbital ephemeris type used.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: FalseEasting
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Value added to all 'x' values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: FalseNorthing
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Value added to all 'y' values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: FilmSourceAvailable
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Indicates whether a black-and-white film source exists.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GeometricRmseModel
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Combined RMSE of the geometric residuals (meters) in both across-track and along-track directions measured on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GeometricRmseModelX
AdditionalAttributes.Description: RMSE of the geometric residuals (meters) measured on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GeometricRmseModelY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: RMSE of the geometric residuals (meters) measured on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GeometricRmseVerify
AdditionalAttributes.Description: RMSE of the geometric residuals (pixels) in both line and sample directions measured on the terrain-corrected product independently using GLS2000.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GridCellSizeReflective
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Grid cell size used in creating the image for the reflective band.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GridCellSizeThermal
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Grid cell size used in creating the image for the thermal band.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GroundControlPointsModel
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of ground control points used in the precision correction process.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GroundControlPointsVerify
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of ground control points used in the verification of the terrain corrected product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: L1Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: L1 Available

AdditionalAttributes.Name: MapProjectionL0ra
AdditionalAttributes.Description: L0Ra map projection selectively applied to HDTs based on geographic location.  Used for processed archive data.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: MapProjectionL1
AdditionalAttributes.Description: L1 map projection applied to this data.  Used for processed archive data.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Orientation
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Orientation used in creating the image.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: OutputFormat
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Output format of the image.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Product
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QualityBand1
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Quality for band of the scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QualityBand2
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Quality for band of the scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QualityBand3
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Quality for band of the scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QualityBand4
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Quality for band of the scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QualityBand5
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Quality for band of the scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QualityBand6
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Quality for band of the scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QualityBand7
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Quality for band of the scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ReflectiveLines
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of product lines for the reflective bands.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ReflectiveSamples
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of product samples for the reflective bands.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ResamplingOption
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Resampling option used in creating the image.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SceneSource
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Source that this version of the scene is stored.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SensorAnomalies
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Special sensor condition (comma separated list)that pertains to this acquisition

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SensorMode
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Mode that the sensor was in during capture of this interval.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: StationId
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Original ground receiving station to which this data was downlinked.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SunAzimuth
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Sun azimuth angle (degrees) at the WRS scene center. A positive value (+) indicates angles to the East or clockwise from North. Zero indicates North. A negative value (-) indicates angles to the West or counterclockwise from North.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SunElevation
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Sun elevation angle (degrees) at the WRS scene center. A positive value (+) indicates a daytime scene. Zero indicates a nighttime scene. A negative value (-) indicates a nighttime scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ThermalLines
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of product lines for the thermal bands.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ThermalSamples
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of product samples for the thermal bands.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: TrueScaleLat
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Latitude of true scale in a map projection.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: UtmZone
AdditionalAttributes.Description: UTM (Universal Transverse Mercator) zone number in a map projection.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VerticalLonFromPole
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Vertical longitude (decimal degrees) from the pole.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: WRSPath
AdditionalAttributes.Description: WRS-defined nominal Landsat satellite track (path).

AdditionalAttributes.Name: WRSRow
AdditionalAttributes.Description: WRS latitudinal center line of a Landsat image.

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description:
Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending
                                or descending)

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description:
Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending
                                or descending)

DataCenters.LongName: Earth Resources Observation and Science Center, U.S. Geological Survey, U.S. Department of the Interior
Earth Resources Observation and Science Center, U.S. Geological Survey, U.S. Department of the Interior
